NeatPopulationUtils
internal
NeatPopulationUtils

Static utility methods related to NeatPopulation{T}.

Functions
ValidateIdSequences
public static bool ValidateIdSequences<T>(
List<NeatGenome<T>> genomeList,
Int32Sequence genomeIdSeq,
Int32Sequence innovationIdSeq
)
where T : struct

Tests if the ID sequence objects represent an ID higher than any existing ID used by the genomes.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Parameters
genomeList
List<NeatGenome<T>>

Genome list.

genomeIdSeq
Int32Sequence

The next genome ID.

innovationIdSeq
Int32Sequence

The next innovation ID.

Returns

True if all genomes in genomeList have an ID that is less than the next genome ID, and have connection genes with IDs less than the next innovation ID; otherwise false.

GetMaxObservedIds
public static void GetMaxObservedIds<T>(
List<NeatGenome<T>> genomeList,
out int maxGenomeId,
out int maxInnovationId
)
where T : struct

Get the maximum genome ID and innovation ID used in the provided genomes.

Type Parameter
T

Neural net numeric data type.

Parameters
genomeList
List<NeatGenome<T>>

Genome list.

maxGenomeId
out int

Returns the maximum genome ID in the genomes of genomeList.

maxInnovationId
out int

Returns the maximum innovation ID in the genomes of genomeList.
